name: Tower Defense (Bonnate(PARK SEUNG GEUN))
description:
Simple Tower Defense Game!

Windows and Android Support.

How to play:

Kill enemies with towers to earn gold, and install more towers to clear as many waves as possible! This game has no ending, and the game ends when life reaches 0.

You can purchase the tower by clicking the button with the tower on the lower left.

1. Ballista: Fires one shot at a time, following the target and hitting it.

2. Straight Tower: If the enemy is in front of you, the arrow is fired right before it, and the arrow passes through the enemy. Damage is reduced by 50% every time it passes through an enemy.

3. Buff Tower: Increases the attack speed of attack towers in a 3x3 area by 50%. These effects are stacked.

Enjoy Game!
